The claim that the: AR" in AR-15 stands for assault rifle is a frequent misconception.
The term: AR" actually stands for ArmaLite Rifle, reflecting the company name of the original manufacturer of the weapon.
ArmaLite sold the design of the rifle to: but the term "AR-15" has persisted and acts as a catch-all for similar guns.
Other manufacturers began making similar: s patents for the AR-15 expired, leading to the popularity of the term "AR-15" as a generic term for all types of AR-15-style rifles.
